ProductInfo.Features:
Get DOUBLE + Spec of A13 tablet for a fraction of price
Huge SPEC for a price: Dual Core Processor CPU&GPU;/ 1GB RAM/ 8GB Flash Memory COMBINED 0.99GB + 4.25GB = 5.24GB - rest of memory used by Android system like ANY OTHER ANDROID DEVICES/ 1024x600 Screen Resolution/ HDMI output/ Latest Android 4.2.2
Local support center & Warranty (1 Year) - no need to send item to China - save money and time
PREINSTALLED Apps- Flash Player 11.1, Youtube, Facebook, Google Maps, Google Playstore, Templerun, Skype
Rubber Coated body gives you better user experience plus additional damage & scratch protection
